name: AEROTEC ESCUELA DE PILOTOS, S.L.
about: AEROTEC Escuela de Pilotos, founded in Madrid in 1993 by airline pilots, is one of the oldest and most reputable flight schools in Spain. With multiple bases across the country, AEROTEC offers integrated and modular pilot courses compliant with European EASA regulations. The school provides training for Private Pilot Licences (PPL), Night Ratings, and Commercial Pilot Licences (CPL), as well as specialized courses such as UPRT (Upset Prevention Recovery Training) and MCC APS (Multi Crew Cooperation Air Pilot Standard) using advanced simulators like the Entrol A32. AEROTEC is dedicated to preparing candidates for the rigorous recruitment processes of airline carriers, ensuring they meet all necessary qualifications. With a long history of excellence, AEROTEC continues to be a leading institution in aviation training.
